name: Text-Based Ball.
description:
if STRIKE == 3:

        $ STRIKE = 0

        UMPIRE "YOU'RE OUT!!"

        $ OUT = OUT + 1

This Program was developed for jackojam, in response to the Daily Prompt for August 7th, 2021: 

"-text adventure game about a game of baseball. how would a text adventure game work in the middle of a baseball match? that's why it's bizzare. (bizzare)" [Boldface is mine.]

Thanks, Jacko, for keeping America's Secretly British Pastime alive and well!! I would not have bothered to learn the rules otherwise.

Rinzai Gigen,

Subliminal Mind Games.

[({R.G.||S.M.G.)}]
